text: "Illusion" is a song by English singer Dua Lipa, released as the third single from her fourth studio album, Radical Optimism (2024). It was released April 19, 2024. Lipa wrote the song with Tobias Jesso Jr. and its producers, Caroline Ailin, Kevin Parker, and Danny L Harle. The song became Lipa's 16th top-ten hit in the UK when it reached number nine there. == References == Category:Dua Lipa songs Category:2024 songs Category:House songs
title: Illusion (Dua Lipa song)
